# Contributing to BbQ.ChatWidgets

Thank you for wanting to contribute! Please review the documentation under `docs_src/contributing/` and run the build and test scripts before submitting a PR.

Key resources:

- [Development setup](../docs_src/contributing/DEVELOPMENT.md)
- [Coding standards](../docs_src/contributing/CODE_STYLE.md)
- [Testing guidance](../docs_src/contributing/TESTING.md)
- [Documentation expectations](../docs_src/contributing/DOCUMENTATION.md)
